channel.description: Testing things out here, for furtheranse of humanities spirits

item.title: What is Mysticism
item.description: Key points of this chapter are that it is up to you to find your answers and only you can start that by opening yourself up to union with reality

item.title: The world of reality
item.description: Awareness can focused on many things. Choosing that our awareness dwells on our senses, instead of our mental chatter, brings us closer to reality.
